SELECT ROWNUM RN , C.CNT AS CNT , C.TAG_ID AS TAG_ID , D.TAG_NM AS TAG_NM FROM ( SELECT COUNT(A.TAG_ID) AS CNT , A.TAG_ID AS TAG_ID FROM BAD1010 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
